name: ptcgo-pokemontcgio
description: Majority of the [Pokemon TCG Online](https://www.pokemon.com/us/pokemon-tcg/play-online/download/) codes map directly to [PokemonTCG.io](http://pokemontcg.io/) ids but there's a lot that don't, like the Trainer Kits, some special collections and so on. Also, some cards like secret rare trainers are missing from Pokemontcg.io.
author: Juha-Matti Santala
